title: Ep. 1039 - A Drag Queen At The Altar
description:
Click here to join the member exclusive portion of my show: https://utm.io/ueSEm  

Today on the Matt Walsh Show, a drag queen is invited on the altar during a church service. But the pastor’s justification for this satanic display tells us more than he intended to reveal. Also, Antifa mobilizes for my event at the University of Houston. Tulsi Gabbard leaves the Democrat Party. The Secretary of the Army says the Army isn’t woke, it’s just inclusive. In our Daily Cancellation, Michelle Obama is teaming up with an organization that just put out the worst get out the vote ad in the history of democracy.

- - - 

DailyWire+:

Candace Owens presents “The Greatest Lie Ever Sold”, streaming exclusively on DailyWire+. Watch the trailer here: https://bit.ly/3dQINt0  

Shop the Jeremy’s Razors Columbus Day Sale to get 40% OFF your Founder’s Series Shave Kit at jeremysrazors.com. 

 - - -
